sentences: Hiromi Go (郷 ひろみ, Gō Hiromi, born October 18, 1955, in Sue, Kasuya, Fukuoka Prefecture), is a Japanese singer, part of Sony Music Entertainment Japan.
In the 1970s, he was called "New Big Three" (新御三家, shin gosanke) with Goro Noguchi and Hideki Saijo.
Hiromi Go featured Japanese hip hop musician Dohzi-T in his R&B-style song "Kimi Dake o," released on May 14, 2008.
Hiromi Go appeared in the movie Samurai Cowboy with Catherine Mary Stewart and Robert Conrad which was released in 1993.
